fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Multi-Dimensional Engagement Scoring
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to calculate complex weighted scores across multiple dimensions and provide drill-down details.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Create an engagement score for all active members using these weighted factors: event attendance (30%), course completion (25%), chapter leadership (20%), committee participation (15%), and years as member (10%). Show the top 20 members in a ranked table. When I click on a member, show me a breakdown chart (pie or bar) of how each factor contributed to their score. Then let me click on any factor in that chart to see the actual underlying activities or data for that dimension.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes ranked table of top 20 members with calculated scores
Clicking member shows visual breakdown of their score by factor
Clicking score factor shows detailed activity table for that dimension
Activity tables allow opening the actual activity records
